column1: #Text=Karu says : " It 's okay , we 're here to help you , Avatar Korra . "

#Text=" Main Asami Sato Bolin Mako Varrick Antagonists Triple Threat Triad Shady Shin Two Toed Ping Viper says : " Minor Desna and Eska Ginger Karu Korra Lin Beifong Lu and Gang Naga Pabu Unalaq Zhu Li " Shiro Shinobi says : " The Avatar has gone missing !
#Text=Three years ago , Zaheer poisoned Korra , severely injuring her .
#Text=While her friends moved on with their lives , Korra remained in the South Pole .
#Text=Everyone thought she was still recuperating , but six months ago , Korra left home and has n't been seen since .
#Text=Even Chief Tonraq was shocked to learn that his daughter 's whereabouts are unknown .
#Text=What has become of the Avatar and when will she return ?
